title: Switch portfolio to a light SaaS-style theme with enhanced motion polish, new hero split layout, and project/skill cards with icons and images

requirements.text: Switch the site visual direction from the current dark glassmorphism theme to a light SaaS-style theme: off-white/soft gray background (not pure white), minimal but premium look, soft shadows/depth, layered sections, rounded corners, and subtle light glassmorphism (light blur + low opacity).

quotes:
Light theme background (off-white / soft gray, not pure white)

Minimal but premium look

Soft shadows, depth, and layered sections

Subtle glassmorphism cards (light blur, low opacity)

Rounded corners and clean spacing

acceptanceCriteria: The default page renders in a light theme (no forced dark mode on initial load).
Background is off-white/soft gray and readable (not pure white), with subtle depth and soft section separation.
Glass-card surfaces appear as subtle light glassmorphism (low opacity + blur) with soft shadow and rounded corners.
Existing components (TopNav, sections, footer, admin panel) remain functional and visually consistent in the light theme.

requirements.text: Update global styling tokens and base background treatment to match the light theme, including subtle background gradients and soft lighting effects that enhance depth without overwhelming the design.

quotes: Add subtle background gradients, floating decorative shapes, and soft lighting effects to enhance depth without overwhelming the design.

acceptanceCriteria: Global CSS variables and base styles produce a coherent light palette (background, foreground, muted, border, ring).
The page background uses subtle gradients/lighting appropriate for a light SaaS layout (no dark bottom gradient).
All text maintains accessible contrast against the light background.

requirements.text: Revise the Hero section to a split layout inspired by clean SaaS landing pages: left column includes the bold headline text exactly “Full-Stack Web & Application Developer”, a 2–3 line professional intro, and social icons with hover animation; right column includes a profile image inside a rounded card with soft shadow, with the image slightly tilted or floating for visual interest.

quotes:
Hero Section

Left side:

Bold headline: Full-Stack Web & Application Developer

Short professional intro (2–3 lines)

Social icons with hover animation

Right side:

Profile image inside a rounded card with soft shadow

Image slightly tilted or floating for visual interest

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section layout is two-column on desktop and stacks cleanly on mobile.
Headline text in Hero matches exactly: “Full-Stack Web & Application Developer”.
Hero includes visible social icons (e.g., GitHub/LinkedIn) with hover animation and accessible labels.
Hero includes a profile image displayed in a rounded card with soft shadow; image/card has a subtle tilt or floating effect.
Hero retains smooth navigation behavior (scrolling to Projects and Contact remains available from the hero area).

requirements.text: Implement smooth, lightweight motion polish across the page: fade-in + slide-up animations triggered on scroll for major section content; smooth page/section transitions; refined hover effects on buttons and cards (lift, soft shadow, slight scale). Honor prefers-reduced-motion by disabling or minimizing these animations when requested.

quotes:
Smooth fade-in and slide-up animations on scroll

Hover effects on buttons and cards (lift, soft shadow, slight scale)

Smooth page transitions
The final website should feel clean, modern, trustworthy, and slightly animated, with more polish and effects than a basic portfolio, but still lightweight and elegant.

acceptanceCriteria: As the user scrolls, each section’s primary content animates in with a subtle fade + upward motion (once per session/viewport entry is acceptable).
Buttons/cards exhibit gentle lift/shadow/scale on hover without jank.
When the OS setting prefers-reduced-motion is enabled, scroll/hover/transition animations are disabled or reduced to near-zero.

requirements.text: Add gentle parallax movement for hero imagery/decorative visuals (e.g., profile image card and/or background shapes) that responds to scroll and remains subtle, performant, and disabled/reduced under prefers-reduced-motion.
acceptanceCriteria: At least one hero visual element exhibits subtle parallax movement during scroll.
Parallax effect does not cause layout shifts and remains smooth on mid-range devices.
Parallax is disabled or significantly reduced under prefers-reduced-motion.

requirements.text: Add subtle cursor-based micro-interactions that enhance depth (e.g., gentle highlight/spotlight or soft glow following the cursor over key surfaces) while remaining minimal (not flashy) and performant, and disabled/reduced under prefers-reduced-motion.
acceptanceCriteria: Cursor micro-interaction is visible but subtle on desktop pointer devices (no large/flashy cursor replacements).
Effect degrades gracefully on touch devices (no broken visuals).
Effect is disabled or reduced under prefers-reduced-motion.

requirements.text: Revise the Skills section to display the specified skills as clean icon cards with a subtle hover glow while preserving the skill list: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, Node.js, Flask, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, AWS, Python AI/ML workflows.

quotes:
Skills

Display skills as clean icon cards with hover glow

Skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, Node.js, Flask, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, AWS, Python AI/ML workflows

acceptanceCriteria: Skills are presented as individual cards (or a clearly card-based grid) with an icon and label per skill.
Cards have a subtle hover glow consistent with the light theme.
All listed skills appear and are readable; no listed skill is omitted.

requirements.text: Revise the Projects section to a card-based layout that includes an image thumbnail, title, and short description for each project, with smooth hover animations. Preserve the existing GitHub repository URLs and keep a clear “View on GitHub” link per project.

quotes:
Projects

Card-based layout with image, title, and short description

Smooth hover animations

acceptanceCriteria: Each project card displays a thumbnail image, project title, and short description.
Project cards have smooth, subtle hover animations (lift/shadow/scale) consistent with the light theme.
Each project includes a “View on GitHub” link pointing to the exact existing URLs already used in the app.

requirements.text: Update the Contact section styling to match the minimal light theme, including clean form styling with soft focus effects; preserve existing validation and success/error states and keep the visible social/profile links area.

quotes:
Contact

Minimal contact section with clean form and soft focus effects

acceptanceCriteria: Contact form fields and buttons are styled for the light theme with soft focus states.
Existing client-side validation, submission behavior, and success/error messaging remain functional.
Social/profile links remain visible and accessible within the contact section.

requirements.text: Add floating decorative shapes and subtle background accents (light-theme appropriate) that contribute to depth and “layered sections” without distracting from content.

quotes: Add subtle background gradients, floating decorative shapes, and soft lighting effects to enhance depth without overwhelming the design.

acceptanceCriteria: At least 2 decorative background elements/shapes are visible (e.g., soft blobs, orbs, abstract shapes) with subtle motion or positioning.
Decorations never obstruct text readability and remain subtle on all breakpoints.
Decorations are non-interactive and do not interfere with scrolling/clicking (pointer-events disabled).

requirements.text: Keep the site fully responsive, fast-loading, SEO-friendly, professional, and client-ready after these design and layout changes (including maintaining appropriate metadata).

quotes:
Fully responsive

Fast loading

SEO-friendly

Professional and client-ready

acceptanceCriteria: All sections render cleanly on mobile, tablet, and desktop without overflow or broken layouts.
No new heavy dependencies are introduced for animations/parallax/cursor effects; performance remains smooth.
Existing title/meta description remain present (update only if needed to align with the new hero headline), and semantic section structure is preserved.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn UI components); compose them instead.
Do not edit immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (backend/main.mo); do not introduce additional backend services.
Keep public site visitor experience unauthenticated; admin-only submissions listing must remain protected.
nonGoals: Do not add project detail pages or routing changes beyond updating the single-page layout styling and section contents.
Do not add third-party authentication providers (Internet Identity only, already present).
Do not add real-time communication features (e.g., WebSockets/chat).
Do not change the contact submission data model or remove admin submissions functionality.

required: Light abstract gradient mesh hero background with soft neutral tones (hero-bg-light.dim_1920x1080.png)
Light glassy abstract orb/accent shape with subtle neutral gradient and transparency (accent-orb-light.dim_800x800.png)
Professional profile portrait illustration/avatar on transparent or light background (profile.dim_900x1100.png)
Set of 3 light-themed project thumbnail images with abstract tech/ML motifs (project-home-price-predictor.dim_1200x800.png)
Set of 3 light-themed project thumbnail images with abstract networking/news motif (project-simplenntp.dim_1200x800.png)
Set of 3 light-themed project thumbnail images with abstract AI/NLP automation motif (project-persevan-ai.dim_1200x800.png)
Light decorative floating shapes pack on transparent background (decor-shapes-light.dim_1400x900.png)

preferencesToAdd: Prefer a light, clean SaaS-style portfolio aesthetic (off-white/soft gray) with subtle light glassmorphism, soft shadows, layered sections, and polished but lightweight animations (scroll reveal, gentle parallax, subtle cursor micro-interactions).
preferencesToRemove: Prefer a dark, glossy premium theme with blue/purple glow as the primary visual direction.
